{include "affiliate_loader"} Iowa politicians are once again targeting trans kids. {include "pre-header-spacing"}{beacon}

{include "default_salutation"} –

This afternoon legislators in the Iowa House introduced an awful bill, House File 2309, that targets transgender girls. This blocks transgender girls from participating in girls' school sports, and that's just wrong.

Please reach out now by emailing your state representative.

Take Action

The bill is moving fast – part of the strategy to minimize opposition – and will likely be in front of a subcommittee by 7:30 a.m. tomorrow morning.

Do your part and tell your state representative that you won't stand for targeting kids and that you support trans girls being treated just like all other girls at school and everywhere – including in the world of sports.

Thanks for defending trans kids,
